name: One Room Hotel (Fab_O)
description:
You're the owner of the famous Three Star Hotel: One Room Hotel, and since there is only one room, customers come and go without time to spare.

As the hard working person you are, your objective is to set the room according to what the next client wants, and you have to do it as fast as posible. If you don't do it in time, you will lose one of your stars!

Made in 48 hours for the Indie Tales Jam.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Z to grab and interact
  • X to rotate
  • Esc to pause the game
